,,, Parallel Flash chip (32 Mbit);Intel;E28F320J3A110;Intel, E28F320, J3A110, A3097065, (M)(C)2000, Flash;1; ,,, RAM chip (64 Mbit);EtronTech;EM628325TS-6;EM628325TS-6, H340802RBT578.1, EtronTech;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;SiGe;SE2529L;SiGe, SE2529L, S261L;1; |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/10/2004 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 738168036301 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0001UEGYA |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== BCM4333 bridge processor w/ NET2280 + mini PCI broadcom BCM4306 card The BCM4333 is using... :'''Intel''' E28F320J3A110 (4MB Flash) :'''EtronTech''' EM638325TS-6 (8MB RAM) "ENG-503-6200" and "WUBB113GU_V00" is silkscreened on the main board.
"MIB100GS_V01" and "109-501-4500" is silkscreened on the Mini PCI wireless module. :There is a MAC label on the wireless module with an 00:0C:41 ('''Cisco-Linksys''') OUI ==Links of Interest== [http://www.usr.com/images/products/product.asp?prod=5420&image=bottom Images] ==Pictures==
